name: Super Blaster Bros
description:
Super Blaster Bros. is a hand-drawn 2D side-scroll shoot'em-up, with 4 person  local multi-player arenas and co-op modes.

CURRENT FEATURES:

  •  Single & Local Multi-Player (1-4)
  •  Player Save Profiles
  •  4 Gauntlet Levels
  •  5 Arena Levels
  • 10 Player Heads
  • 3 Ammo Skins
  • Best Times 

FEEDBACK-

Your feedback really helps out a lot, be it catching bugs/glitches,  general feedback on current features, or suggestions on features you would like to see implemented or improved, even just to say good job to keep the morale up. It all helps.

PRICING-

Have it for free and enjoy it, maybe tell a friend or two,or leave some nice feedback. Donations are greatly appreciated and allow continued development.

Right Bumper = Camera Switch (player 1 only)

B = Shoot
